description: Whitelist of institutions that legitimately lack certain degree levels. These institutions will not be marked as 'incomplete' in coverage reports.

tue.reason: TU/e (Eindhoven University of Technology) does not offer premaster programs. Students enter directly into master's programs after completing a bachelor's degree.
